rules_text:
Fathom {8}{U}{U} [i](If you cast this by sacrificing a creature or Vehicle and paying the fathom cost reduced by that permanent's mana value, put this onto the battlefield as a creature after it resolves or loses targets.)[/i]
Each opponent mills eight cards.
Whenever Drown in Ken of Shore attacks, exile target instant or sorcery card from defending player's graveyard. You may cast a copy of it without paying its mana cost.
